items.title: How do I place an order?
items.content: Browse our collections, select your desired size and color, add items to your bag, and proceed to checkout. You can check out as a guest or create an account for faster future purchases.

items.title: Can I modify or cancel my order?
items.content: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 1 hour of placement. After that, our fulfillment process begins and changes cannot be guaranteed. Contact us at hello@snugandknot.com for assistance.

items.title: Do you offer gift wrapping?
items.content: Yes! We offer complimentary gift wrapping in our signature recycled kraft paper with a gold thread tie. Select the gift wrap option during checkout.

items.title: How long does shipping take?
items.content: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days within the US, and 7-14 business days internationally. Express shipping (2-3 business days) is available at checkout for domestic orders.

items.title: Is shipping free?
items.content: We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $100. For orders under $100, a flat rate of $8.95 applies for domestic shipping.

items.title: Do you ship internationally?
items.content: Yes, we ship to over 40 countries worldwide. International shipping rates are calculated at checkout based on destination and package weight. Duties and taxes may apply.

items.title: What materials do you use?
items.content: We exclusively use 100% natural fibers: organic cotton, merino wool, linen, and cashmere blends. Every fiber is traceable to its origin. No synthetic materials are used in any of our garments.

items.title: How do I find my size?
items.content: Each product page includes a detailed size guide with measurements in both inches and centimeters. If you're between sizes, we generally recommend sizing up for a relaxed fit or down for a closer silhouette.

items.title: Are your products sustainable?
items.content: Sustainability is woven into every decision we make. Our materials are responsibly sourced, our packaging is 100% biodegradable, and we maintain carbon-neutral shipping through verified offset programs.

items.title: How do I care for my garments?
items.content: Care instructions vary by material. Visit our Care Instructions page for detailed guidance on washing, drying, and storing each type of fabric. General rule: cold wash, lay flat to dry, and store folded.

items.title: What is your return policy?
items.content: We offer a 30-day return policy on all unworn items in original condition with tags attached. Sale items can be returned within 14 days for store credit only.

items.title: How do I initiate a return?
items.content: Log into your account, navigate to your order history, and select 'Initiate Return' on the relevant order. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within 24 hours.

items.title: When will I receive my refund?
items.content: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return. The amount will be credited to your original payment method. You'll receive an email confirmation when the refund is issued.

items.title: Do I need an account to order?
items.content: No, you can check out as a guest. However, creating an account gives you access to order tracking, faster checkout, wishlist features, and exclusive member pricing.

items.title: How do I reset my password?
items.content: Click 'Sign In' in the header, then 'Forgot Password.' Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link. The link expires after 24 hours for security.
